description:
Do you need to exercise but don't know where to start? Has a doctor or anyone else told you that you need to exercise? Do you want to live a long, healthy life? Then this course is for YOU! It is designed for everyday people who are BUSY with jobs and family. It will give you a tool kit to get started exercising and be successful in reaching your GOALS. In the course we will go over

  • the benefits of exercise – feeling better and better mental health
  • the different types of exercise
  • how to just get started easily
  • setting good goals and making a plan
  • using proper rewards
  • the importance of accountability
  • devices, apps, and resources to help you in your journey


This 30 minute course will provide all this information and more to help you live LONGER and BETTER! As a college professor and personal trainer I've helped others with their struggle to be fit for over 20 years and I have some incredible success stories.

Don't delay! Add years to your life and life to your years!
title: So Your Doctor Told You to Exercise – Now What?
